messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

event occurred tickets to be logged as sent monday february event occurred tickets be logged hello can you please raise ticket with snow change how event occurred alert tickets automatically logged need be logged proof please find attached export fusion showing when manually logged these tickets were logged export snow showing being automatically logged thanks kindest regards analyst pl
